titleStmt.title: The CL. Psalmes of David in Scottish meter: after the forme that they are vsed to bee sung in the Kirke of Scotland.
titleStmt.author: Church of Scotland.

notesStmt.note: Title page within ornamental border (McK. & Ferg. 264).
Imperfect: tightly bound; N₄v-O stained, with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
